name: Schnitzelhunt
short_description:
The "Schnitzelhunt" is a mobile educational ralley (scavenger hunt) for cellphones. 

Schnitzelhunt can be used just for fun, but it was conceptualized as a mobile learning tool to support lectures in tradtitional education.
